trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Grants Pass
There were no other sightings in Grants Pass on or around June 18th 2011
Summary: Bright white just appeared, move south to north then faded only to reappear many miles north for a brief time then faded again
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking south west at about 40 degrees when a verybright light appeared, moveing to the north. There was no sound or other lights. It then faded out.It was moveing slowly, but it travel about four times the distance I figured it would move on its course. I watched for a few minutes , when it appear much farther north then move on and faded out again. No sound no other colors and it was much brighter then any thing else in the sky.This takes place at my home. I'm not sure what it was, but I've been around airplanes all my life. It didn't act like a plane.
